title: @Riot Is there a reason Wukong's champion page on the Universe site says Monkey King?
body: I was going through the universe page and realized Wukong's champion page address has "monkeyking" instead of his name at the end like all other champs. I was just wondering if there was some Riot inside joke with that or what.

replies.body: Wukong's file structure for League lists him as Monkey King instead of Wukong. This is true for just about everything Wukong related.

^ sharjo always has it right!

This is something we may fix on Universe in the future so that you can go to /wukong and it will work, but we don't have any plans to change it since it's not a crucial issue or anything.
Probably a spoiler to ask, but do you guys intend on keeping Wukong as the "Monkey King"? I'm not against it, but he doesn't feel like a king to me.
